mapper.select: SELECT o.order_id, o.orderer_name, o.orderer_address, o.order_date, o.status, oi.order_item_id AS orderItemId, oi.order_id AS orderId, oi.book_id AS bookId, oi.quantity FROM tbl_order o LEFT JOIN tbl_order_item oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id WHERE o.status = #{status}
